supplier_of: hunting and fishing equipment and special products | lingerie, underwear and indoor clothing | games and toys
information: The company EINKAUFSZENTRUM BERKA KG, is a Wholesaler, founded in 1935, which operates in the Hunting and fishing equipment and special products industry. It also operates in the Lingerie, underwear and indoor clothing, and Games and toys industries. It is based in Saalfelden Am Steinernen Meer, Austria.
